text:
Hello,
I'm actually in my first year to the university. When I came to visit the university, I heard speak about a program which allows to go in an other country to study. I really hope that i could try this experiment because there is a lot of things to discover. If I'm writing to you, it's because even if I want to do this program, I can't pay for that.
So, I wish that I can have your help to contribute for the program. I think that you know how the student life is expensive... Pay for an apartment and for food for example. Because of that, it's really difficult for me to pay alone. In addition, I don't have a job because I don't have a time for this and my parents can't pay so much for the trip. They pay my food and the activities that I do in the city so you understand that they can't contribute a lot for the program.
For my part, and if you accept, I want to study in Paris. This beautiful country and his culture interest my curiosity. A trip like that is a huge opportunity to open the spirit. I think that all the students must have a free trip in an other country. I hope go in english countries in the future to learn more english. I think that the best to learn a langage is to go in the country where the langage is spoken. Do this experiment is a chance for all of us so, I really hope that you can help you.
Thank you a lot,
Alex Dupont, student in information-communication in the university Rennes 2.
